
Hi!

I am Jean-Marc Thiery (https://perso.telecom-paristech.fr/jthiery/)
I took the liberty to extract this library from the project of Ngoc-Trung Tran (https://github.com/tntrung/graphcut_segmentation , https://github.com/tntrung).

If you use this software, please:
- check the web page of Ngoc-Trung Tran for license agreements
- cite the following article:
	"An Experimental Comparison of Min-Cut/Max-Flow Algorithms for Energy Minimization in Vision."
	Yuri Boykov and Vladimir Kolmogorov.
	In IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (PAMI), 
	September 2004
